dct:identifier.title: Distribution identifier
dct:identifier.description:
Identifier for this distribution. If left empty, it will be automatically assigned.

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dct:identifier': An identifier of the distribution must be provide as a sh:Literal.
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dcat-distribution-identifier

dcat:accessURL.title: Access URL
dcat:accessURL.description:
URL to a page for accessing this distribution. This must not be a direct download URL but, for example, a link to a webpage containing download links.

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dcat:accessURL': Please provide an access url for the distribution.
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dcat-accessurl-dcat

dcatap:availability.title: Distribution availability
dcatap:availability.description: This property indicates how long it is planned to keep the Distribution available. You can find the available values here: Planned availability.

dct:format.title: File format
dct:format.description:
File format for this distribution (e.g., CSV, JSON).

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dct:format': The distribution format must be chosen from the controlled vocabulary available at:
        http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/file-type.
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dct-format-dcat

dct:modified.title: Last modification date
dct:modified.description:
Last modification date of the data in this distribution.

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dct:modified': The modification date must be provided in ISO-8601 format as xsd:date, xsd:dateTime, xsd:gYear, or xsd:gYearMonth.
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dcat-distribution-modified

dcat:downloadURL.title: Download URL
dcat:downloadURL.description: Direct download URL of the distribution file. This link must directly point to the file.

dct:title.title: Distribution title
dct:title.description:
Title for the distribution, in multiple languages.

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dct:title': The title of the distribution must be provided as language-tagged strings in at least one of the following languages: de, en, fr, it.
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dcat-distribution-title

dct:description.title: Distribution description
dct:description.description:
Description for the distribution, in multiple languages.

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dct:description': The description of the distribution must be provided as language-tagged strings in at least one of the following languages: de, en, fr, it.
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dcat-distribution-description

dct:conformsTo.title: Conforms to
dct:conformsTo.description:
Reference to a standard or specification the distribution conforms to.

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dct:conformsTo': The dct:conformsTo property must to be provided as an IRI.
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dct-conformsto-dcat

dct:license.title: License
dct:license.description:
License under which this distribution is released. This is mandatory for opendata.swiss publications.

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dct:license': The license must be chosen from the controlled vocabulary available at:
	http://dcat-ap.ch/vocabulary/licenses.      
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dct-license-dcat

dcat:accessService.title: Access service
dcat:accessService.description:
Reference to data services used to provide access to the data.

**Portal Requirement:** Class 'dcat:Distribution' - Property 'dcat:accessService': The dcat:accessService property must to be provided as an IRI.
        See https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html#dcat-accessservice-dcat
